attributes.additional_details:
I really hope you can do this because I have pets myself and every night they are scared and shaking in a corner, not eating because of the noise of the fireworks. 
There are noise free ones for a reason so please ban the ones that make noise
attributes.background: People can purchase noise free fireworks to enjoy/celebrate without causing trauma for those who suffer from PTSD and the animals who stress because they are scared.
